# Stage 1: Build the Angular app FROM node:20 AS build WORKDIR /app COPY package.json package-lock.json ./ RUN npm ci COPY . . RUN npm run build -- --output-path=dist
# Stage 2: Serve with Nginx FROM nginx:1.25-alpine ENV HOST=0.0.0.0 ENV PORT=80 COPY --from=build /app/dist /usr/share/nginx/html COPY public/favicon.ico /usr/share/nginx/html/favicon.ico COPY nginx.conf /etc/nginx/nginx.conf EXPOSE ${PORT} CMD ["sh", "-c", "nginx -g 'daemon off;'"]
